attributes.action: Introduce at least one carriage on trains for mask-wearing passengers only
attributes.additional_details: Covid looks to be part of our future for a long time yet, so we should be planning to enable vulnerable people to socialise, commute and travel more safely. Even beyond covid (hopefully there is a beyond!) this measure could make a big difference to those who have to travel but take a significant risk doing so. We’ll always have vulnerable and immunocompromised people in our society, but we can normal make life less dangerous for them.
attributes.background:
Make trains safer for clinically vulnerable people, by introducing a specific carriage for mask-wearers.

Whilst going maskless on a train is a risk much of the population is willing to take, there are many who feel like extremely uncomfortable travelling alongside them, or cannot take the risk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Require mask-only carriages on all trains
